name: The Terraformer Cat
description:
The Terraformer Cat is a small rogue like. When you enter a new level, you choose the type of content that's about to be generated. Select Plain, Desert, Snow or Lake, explore the world, collect mana and try to reach the Temple of elements alive!

How to play:

The game is entirely playable with the mouse.

You can also use Arrows or wasd to move, attack or talk.

Credits:

  • Code/Sprites by myself (sprvrn)
  • m3x6, a font by Daniel Linssen
